description: On may 11, 1995, eight artists gathered in Austin, Texas to pay tribute to Stevie Ray Vaughn, who died five years prior after participating in a similar meeting in Alpin Valley, Wisconsin. Artist featured: Eric Clapton, Buddy Guy, Robert Cray, Jimmie Vaughn, B.B. King, Bonnie Raitt, Dr. John and Art Neville. Also including interviews with the artists as well as highlights of Stevie's performances on the PBS series "Astin City Limits." Running time: 80 minutes.
